title: Meme Mayhem
description:
Do your roguelite games not have enough memes? Want to fight your social media enemies in nailbiting emoji battles? Log in to the world of Meme Mayhem. Scroll the in-game feed, react to posts, and pick fights with celebrities. Slide into the DMs of characters like Pop Kat, Mars, and Sad Tadpole . Whether you’re a selfless idealist or just looking for fortune and fame, you’re on your way to the top of the social media food chain.
Select perk rewards after each wave to build the perfect attack stack then watch as battles play out automatically. Deal damage by throwing Rocks, steal health with Vampire, catch your enemies on fire with Oil, and more. Snatch victory from the jaws of defeat by deploying a much-needed Ultimate moments before your health dwindles to zero! In the case of defeat, tailor your strategy to suit the challenge and try again.

system_requirements.Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
